title: Turquake - Earthquake Analysis & Prediction System
excerpt: Completed comprehensive ML system analyzing 125 years of Turkish earthquake data. Features LightGBM with RÂ² 0.95, K-Means/DBSCAN clustering, 80+ engineered features, GPU acceleration with PyTorch, and interactive Streamlit web app with risk maps for 50 Turkish cities.

title: Summer Internship Opportunity - ML/Data Science
